content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (-14.5, -48.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-15.0, -50.0) extracting iron ore
- Wooden Chest at position (-14.5, -48.5) storing extracted iron ore
- Stone Furnace at position (-13.0, -48.0) smelting iron ore into iron plates
- Burner Inserter at position (-14.5, -46.5) transferring iron ore from the chest to the furnace

### Coal Mining and Processing Facility at Position (41.5, -80.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (41.0, -82.0) extracting coal
- Wooden Chest at position (41.5, -80.5) storing extracted coal
- Stone Furnace at position (43.0, -82.0) used for smelting operations
- Burner Inserter at position (43.5, -80.5) transferring items to the furnace

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors Due to Insufficient Inventory for Insertion
- Ensure you have enough items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into a furnace or any other entity. Keep track of your inventory levels to avoid such errors.

### Errors When Attempting to Insert Items into a Full Chest
- Before inserting items, check if the chest has enough space to accommodate them. If the chest is full, empty it to continue operations smoothly.

### Errors When Entities Are Waiting for Source Items
- Ensure that inserters have access to source items by maintaining a steady supply chain. If an inserter is waiting for items, verify the upstream supply and address any bottlenecks.
